body:
I started a cluster running on GCE last week, using `go run hack/e2e.go -build -up`. Today I noticed today that both of my minion nodes were stuck in the NotReady state:

```
$ kubectl get nodes
NAME                           LABELS                                                STATUS
e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a   kubernetes.io/hostname=e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a   NotReady
e2e-test-stclair-minion-i5b9   kubernetes.io/hostname=e2e-test-stclair-minion-i5b9   NotReady
```

Inspecting the logs yields the same error message over and over again:

```
stclair@e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a:~$ tail /var/log/kubelet.log      
W0625 21:18:55.371135    2928 request.go:292] field selector: v1 - pods - spec.host - e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a: need to check if this is versioned correctly.
E0625 21:18:55.371813    2928 reflector.go:136] Failed to list *api.Node: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get nodes)
E0625 21:18:55.371940    2928 reflector.go:136] Failed to list *api.Pod: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get pods)
E0625 21:18:55.737900    2928 kubelet.go:1591] error getting node: node e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a not found
E0625 21:18:55.748663    2928 kubelet.go:1212] Failed creating a mirror pod "fluentd-elasticsearch-e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a_default": the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (post pods)
E0625 21:18:56.202222    2928 reflector.go:136] Failed to list *api.Service: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get services)
W0625 21:18:56.371997    2928 request.go:292] field selector: v1 - nodes - metadata.name - e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a: need to check if this is versioned correctly.
W0625 21:18:56.372199    2928 request.go:292] field selector: v1 - pods - spec.host - e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a: need to check if this is versioned correctly.
E0625 21:18:56.372828    2928 reflector.go:136] Failed to list *api.Node: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get nodes)
E0625 21:18:56.373378    2928 reflector.go:136] Failed to list *api.Pod: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get pods)
```

Same with the proxy:

```
stclair@e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a:~$ tail -n 5 /var/log/kube-proxy.log 
E0625 21:18:44.957584    2968 api.go:180] Unable to load endpoints: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get endpoints)
E0625 21:19:31.023914    2968 api.go:108] Unable to load services: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get services)
E0625 21:20:08.662204    2968 api.go:180] Unable to load endpoints: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get endpoints)
E0625 21:20:43.884667    2968 api.go:108] Unable to load services: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get services)
E0625 21:21:15.108205    2968 api.go:180] Unable to load endpoints: the server has asked for the client to provide credentials (get endpoints)
```

Version:

```
$ kubectl describe nodes e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a
W0625 14:05:10.463312   16838 request.go:291] field selector: v1beta3 - events - involvedObject.uid - e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a: need to check if this is versioned correctly.
W0625 14:05:10.463428   16838 request.go:291] field selector: v1beta3 - events - involvedObject.name - e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a: need to check if this is versioned correctly.
W0625 14:05:10.463441   16838 request.go:291] field selector: v1beta3 - events - involvedObject.namespace - : need to check if this is versioned correctly.
W0625 14:05:10.463451   16838 request.go:291] field selector: v1beta3 - events - involvedObject.kind - Node: need to check if this is versioned correctly.
Name:           e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a
Labels:         kubernetes.io/hostname=e2e-test-stclair-minion-cu9a
CreationTimestamp:  Thu, 18 Jun 2015 18:10:36 -0700
Conditions:
  Type      Status      LastHeartbeatTime           LastTransitionTime          Reason                  Message
  Ready     Unknown     Fri, 19 Jun 2015 13:52:08 -0700     Fri, 19 Jun 2015 13:52:53 -0700     Kubelet stopped posting node status.    
Addresses:  10.240.179.67,146.148.78.88
Capacity:
 cpu:       1
 memory:    3800808Ki
 pods:      100
Version:
 Kernel Version:        3.16.0-0.bpo.4-amd64
 OS Image:          Debian GNU/Linux 7 (wheezy)
 Container Runtime Version: docker://1.6.2
 Kubelet Version:       v0.19.0-634-g2fab19a748fabb-dirty
 Kube-Proxy Version:        v0.19.0-634-g2fab19a748fabb-dirty
PodCIDR:            10.245.1.0/24
ExternalID:         1522119118968509696
Pods:               (0 in total)
No events.
```

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

title: kubelet does not recover from machine reboot
